posts.post_content:
I'm starting to search for cards of players who spent some time in Columbus, Ohio during their career. Some of these issues I've heard of, but have never laid eyes on. I would imagine I'm going to keep this thread updated over the years as I try to track down these pieces. Anything you have available please let me know. While I may not purchase everything today, I will keep everyone updated on my purchasing plans. 

Thanks in advance,

Steven

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], anything you have available.

N300 Mayo's Cut Plug
Charlie Abby Washington
Jimmy Bannon Boston

N284 Buchner Gold Coin
Bill Hart Milwaukee

1898 Cameo Pepsin
Buttons Briggs Chicago
John Grimm Brooklyn
Edwin F. Hutchinson Cedar Rapids
Bill Merritt Pittsburg

1889 Police Gazette Cabinets 
George Tebeau

1899 Chickering Studio Cabinets
Harvey Bailey

1872 Warren Studio Red Stockings Cabinets
Carl McVey
